summary: A young, nonconforming woman named Tessa gets entangled in a cat-and-mouse chase in the by-lanes of Kerala, hunting for a mysterious artist who previously lived in her apartment.
cast: Dulquer Salmaan|Parvathy Thiruvothu|Aparna Gopinath|Nedumudi Venu|Tovino Thomas|Seetha|Soubin Shahir|K.P.A.C. Lalitha|Chemban Vinod Jose|Kalpana|Amithabh|Anoop|P. Balachandran|Shereej K. Basheer|Molly Kannamaly|Neeraj Madhav|Joy Mathew|Minon|Nassar|Omana Ouseph|Renji Panicker|Ramesh Pisharody|Rajesh|Kannan Sagar|Reshma Sebastian|Rajesh Sharma|Shibu|Shobharaj|Sunil Sukhada|Surjith|Jayaraj Warrier
title: Charlie
